nodes.text: Pilot Academy was the dream school for Roan Novachez, a young Tatooinian male Human, who aspired to become a pilot like his father and brother. Discovered to be Force-sensitive, he ended up training at the Jedi academy at the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. Davin Novachez, his older brother, attended there for several years. The academy also had long-term field trips, as Davin told Roan they camped on Hoth for two weeks.
